summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2235 for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue North, from Roanoke Street to Shelby Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein or proper dimensions and materials, together with the construction of a suitable outfall into Lake Union, and all other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 22906 as the same now stands be, and the same is hereby in all things approved.
